text: General Ibrahim Badamasi Babangida (born 17 August 1941) popularly known as IBB, is a Nigerian politician and military general. He was military President of Nigeria from 1985 until his resignation in 1993. He also was the Chief of Army Staff from January 1984 to August 1985. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Nigeria Category:Nigerian generals
title: Ibrahim Babangida
